channel.title: Educational outreach on In Data We Trust
channel.description: Recent content in Educational outreach on In Data We Trust

item.title: Teaching R to High School Students
item.description: Press release Thirteen high school students from across the state participated in this year’s Data Analytics Camp at South Dakota State University (SDSU) main campus from June 18th to 21st, 2018. There were six girls and seven boys. The students lived in college student’s dorms for four days. Most learning activities were in a computer lab in Solberg Hall. As most college students are away during the summer, the high school students got to use a lot of facilities and services.
